alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:02PM EDT until September 09 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTY... At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mackeyville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Lamar, Mill Hall, Flemington, Castanea, Mackeyville, Beech Creek and Lock Haven University. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Bellefonte and Loganton exits, specifically from mile markers 171 to 181. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
